text: ( Source : NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund Inc) The NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund, Inc. ( LDF ) acknowledges the passing of the Honorable Ralph Gingles, Jr., a veteran judge and voting rights pioneer from Gaston , North
